snippet: Despite their current winning streak over Army, the Midshipmen refused to gloat this week, knowing their opponents would soon be their allies.
abstract: Army and Navy meet on the football field for 113th time and even with Navy dominating the last 10 meetings to make the longest win streak in the series, midshipmen refuse to discount competitive nature of the game, while noting that both teams will eventually be serving nation together.
lead_paragraph: Despite their current winning streak over Army, the Midshipmen refused to gloat this week, knowing their opponents would soon be their allies.

headline.seo: Navy Dominates Its Rival But Reveres It as an Equal
headline.main: Despite 10 Straight Wins in Series, Navy Reveres Army as an Equal
headline.print_headline: Despite 10 Straight Wins in Series, Navy Reveres Army as an Equal
